caption: We are ready to tackle our first full week of the fall semester! Extra credit (in the form of a True Grit high five) to any new students who can find themselves in the class photo!

Cristian Mena and William McConnell, both seniors studying mechanical engineering, and Emily DiMarzio, a junior studying environmental science and geography, were all selected to join The Key Bridge Rebuild Internship Program this summer. The Key Bridge internship program launched this year as a partnership between the @themdta and @mdmhec. Link in bio to read more!

Happy first day of classes, Retrievers! What did we learn at Convocation yesterday? Ask questions! If you find yourself unsure of where your next class is (or just want to grab some swag), there are info tents around campus to answer all your questions. We're looking forward to making this our best year yet!
